com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers

Class Ds3ClientHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers.Ds3ClientHelpers

  • public abstract class Ds3ClientHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper around the Ds3Client which automates common tasks.

      Queries job information based on job id and returns a Ds3ClientHelpers.WriteJob that can resume the job.

                                                        java.io.IOException,
                                                        XmlProcessingException
        Performs a bulk put job creation request and returns an Ds3ClientHelpers.WriteJob. See Ds3ClientHelpers.WriteJob for information on how to write the objects for the job.

        java.security.SignatureException
        java.io.IOException
        XmlProcessingException

                                                  throws java.security.SignatureException,
                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                         XmlProcessingException

      • ensureBucketExists

        public abstract void ensureBucketExists(java.lang.String bucket)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.security.SignatureException
        Ensures that a bucket exists. The the bucket does not exist, it will be created.
        Parameters:
        bucket - The name of the bucket to check that it exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.SignatureException

      • listObjectsForDirectory

        public abstract java.lang.Iterable<Ds3Object> listObjectsForDirectory(java.nio.file.Path directory)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an object list with which you can call startWriteJob based on the files in a directory. This method traverses the directory recursively.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
